about_the_game:
--- NOTE ---

most of the gameplay is in multiplayer

--- lore coop boss ---

you are locked in room with boss
the boss is a big ball one of the leaders of the project balls

--- lore plant & defuse ---

you are at point where you have to plant a bomb or defuse it
this happend after they disagreed in something

--- lore hide & seek ---

long time hide has been end soon because
there is somebody that wants something from
hiding people

--- lore knife tag ---

you are in situation when somebody has knife
and you play tag with the guy and then
he doesnt want to play anymore and strat playing knife tag

--- lore horror ---

you have been locked to maze kind of laboratory and there is ball monster
you need to survive long as possible if you die balls will take over

--- lore survival "balls" ---

you live in universe where boxes live but project balls got wild project balls escaped from lab
and started killing boxes after that operation balls was made where you are in
you need to destroy all balls to win this war with multiple weapons found in game

--- graphics ---

-not so good graphics for up to date
-very hot models

--- chat ---

-chat is unmoderated so please dont do anything stupid in the chat

--- gameplay ---

-boring gameplay
-half of movement is broken
-avaible to run over walls
-singleplayer is not completed multiplayer is only almost playable thing in game
-after jump it just continues until releasing jump key
-avaible to slide forever

--- multiplayer ---

-survival "balls" game mode has only one ball
-if over 2 players then player object teleports
-"hammer of speed" is broken
-deathmatch works pretty well
-plant & defuse kinda broken

--- controls ---
-game resolution 640 x 480
-move left A
-move right D
-move forward W
-move back S
-move camera MOUSE
-START MULTIPLAYER LAN 1
-START MULTIPLAYER INTERNET 2
-change multiplayer mode F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, F6
-shoot LEFT CLICK MOUSE
-scope with sniper RIGHT CLICK MOUSE
-change ability or gun RIGHT CLICK MOUSE
-run SHIFT
-activate bot B
-disable bot N
-disable mouse lock P
-change object top of head X
-change music M
-open chat T ( ONLY IN INTERNET MULTIPLAYER )
-exit ESC

--- NOTE ---

most of the gameplay is in multiplayer

--- lore coop boss ---

you are locked in room with boss
the boss is a big ball one of the leaders of the project balls

--- lore plant & defuse ---

you are at point where you have to plant a bomb or defuse it
this happend after they disagreed in something

you need to survive long as possible if you die balls will take over

--- lore survival "balls" ---

and started killing boxes after that operation balls was made where you are in
you need to destroy all balls to win this war with multiple weapons found in game

name: Fast & Blast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-13900K CPU
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

short_description: multiplayer survival mode story - you live in universe where boxes live but project balls got wild project balls escaped from lab and started killing boxes after that operation balls was made where you are in you need to destroy all balls to win this war with multiple weapons found in game
